en.description: Dizzying Rounds is an weapon augment mod for Bronco and Bronco Prime that increases its status chance while giving them the ability to stun enemies and open them up to finishers if shot within 8m of the player.

ru.description: Dizzying Rounds is an weapon augment mod for Bronco and Bronco Prime that increases its status chance while giving them the ability to stun enemies and open them up to finishers if shot within 8m of the player.
